title: Collaboration-Based Online Training Course for Strengthening Telemedicine Practical Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge or relevant work experience
context.additional_context: Systematically developing core competencies required for telemedicine practice through interdisciplinary collaboration and real-case analysis.

learning_goals: Learners can understand and explain remote medical platform operational procedures and relevant legal regulations.
Through real-case-based scenarios, learners can develop problem-solving strategies for potential issues in telemedicine consultations.
Learners can perform remote consultation simulations using digital tools (e.g., basic medical record apps) applicable in smartphone environments.
Through project-based assessments, learners can create remote medical operation manuals reflecting multidisciplinary collaboration protocols.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
